7ec36eb1-bd51-4c38-bdb9-2c786e68ade2.description: This badge is awarded to successful graduates of the Influence Through Data-Driven Insights, a global program designed to increase and enhance the delivery of data and market insights. Participants of the program learn how to interpret and scrutinize data in various forms and then apply the data to make informed recommendations. Through this process, they will determine the best way to present the data visually, so the audience can make the most informed decisions.
7ec36eb1-bd51-4c38-bdb9-2c786e68ade2.name: Influence Through Data Driven Insights Graduate

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of Influence Through Data-Driven Insights require 12 hours of coursework over the course of 8 weeks.  The workshops provide theory as well as a hands-on experience for participants to learn how to interpret data, make data-driven decisions, and create effective data visualizations.

Participants present a final presentation to their leaders which requires them to analyze data to solve a problem or fulfill a request.  Based on their observation, they make a recommendation(s) based on the data and create a call to action, so the issue can be quickly solved.  RSR leaders assess if they have mastered data fluency skills in delivering insight.

Participants learn change management strategies for implementing data fluency into their account management strategies.  After completing the program, graduates will incorporate insight and data delivery into their daily activities.

904f5b17-8674-43cc-91ef-77b8ca621d3e.description: What differentiates Challenger sellers from the rest, especially in complex selling environments, is their ability to Teach customers about hidden costs and risks in their business, Tailor their messages to particular customer roles or communication styles, Take Control of the customer’s decision-making journey, coaching them through each step. These skills together create an effective balance of Constructive Tension that motivates the customer to action.
904f5b17-8674-43cc-91ef-77b8ca621d3e.name: Challenger Sale

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have successfully completed a 7-week virtual intensive "challenger sale foundations" program.  The full learning journey consists of 32 hours of live facilitated virtual workshops, 6 hours of self-guided study, and an average of 6-8 of project-based teamwork.
Earners of this badge are required to submit a practical application-based portfolio of how they've structured a commercial teaching insight and how they've tailored it for multiple stakeholders.
Earners of this badge have had their individual work assessed by a certified challenger trainer and presented their commercial teaching insight live for an expert panel.

skills.name: Building And Managing Constructive Tension In Customer Conversations

b7ca254f-01f5-411e-b97e-efeaac8ac9af.description: This program is a combination of an online social branding course and a re-structured format of the Challenger Sale. It is targeted to upskill those working as sourcing specialists and recruiters on how to engage passive candidates with value add conversations.
b7ca254f-01f5-411e-b97e-efeaac8ac9af.name: Challenger Recruiter

badge_template_activities.title: This is an 8 week virtual intensive with an average of 2 hours of dedicated program time a week.
Participants must submit a commercial teaching message targeted at engaging a passive candidate.
Participants submit a final work portfolio from the program including a video sample of how they've leveraged their network through social media.

bb79a6d1-e1df-4281-84b7-e851436884f8.description: This badge is awarded to successful graduates of the Randstad Global Mentorship Certification Program offered through the Frits Goldschmeding Academy. Participants learn the competencies and skills to be a powerful mentor through an intensive 13-week training curriculum, 25 hours of program mentorship experience, and a comprehensive knowledge exam to ensure the highest of mentorship standards are met.
bb79a6d1-e1df-4281-84b7-e851436884f8.name: Randstad Certified Mentor

badge_template_activities.title: Randstad Global Certified Mentor Training 13-week virtual intensive. This program brings together employees from over 24 countries in which Randstad operates who are wanting to learn how to be a powerful mentor. The program combines both theory and practice.
There is a comprehensive knowledge exam in which participants must prove their understanding, and application, of the skills and tools, used by powerful mentors.

Mentors are required to complete 25 hours of mentorship with a dedicated mentee and 13 hours of peer mentoring. Feedback sessions focus on continuous improvement, courage, curiosity, positive inquiry, and strength-based coaching.

4cfecd13-f62c-4efc-90f6-9f21e4454f2e.description: This badge is awarded to successful graduates of Leadership Our Way, a global program designed to increase leadership capabilities to effectively manage and develop employees and teams. Participants of the program learn how to lead with a growth mindset, successfully manage performance, and build high-performing teams. Graduates of this program experience increased confidence, influence, and management skills.
4cfecd13-f62c-4efc-90f6-9f21e4454f2e.name: Leadership Our Way Graduate

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have successfully completed a 4-week foundational program in people management at Randstad. Attending 4 hours of facilitated workshops and 2 hours of self-guided study.
Earners of this badge are required to demonstrate their knowledge of people management through an end-point assessment on the topics covered.
Earners of this badge have been observed in the flow-of-work by their manager putting into practice the skills, knowledge, and behaviors outlined in this program.

dc1050f7-5ea1-4b22-887a-26aa916855ec.description: What differentiates Challenger Business Partners, is their ability to Teach customers about hidden costs and risks in their business, Tailor their messages to particular customer roles or communication styles, Take Control of the customer’s decision-making journey, coaching them through each step. These skills together create an effective balance of Constructive Tension that motivates the customer to action and helps the customer to see the value of change.
dc1050f7-5ea1-4b22-887a-26aa916855ec.name: Challenger Partner

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have successfully completed a 8-week virtual program that covers the 4 modules and approaches key to becoming a Challenger. The full learning journey consists of 15 hours of live facilitated virtual workshops, 2-3 hours of self-guided study, and an average of 1-2 hours of applied groupwork.
Earners of this badge are required to submit a practical application-based portfolio of how they've structured a commercial teaching insight and how they've tailored it for multiple stakeholders

Earners of this badge have had their individual work assessed by a certified challenger trainer and presented their group work (applied learning of a commercial teaching insight) to a live expert panel.

skills.name: Building And Managing Constructive Tension In Customer Conversations

6febf458-5362-4fe3-a7b6-2be00a8c3923.description: The Randstad Sourceright LEAN white belt certification combines elements of LEAN and six sigma, seeking to implement a way of working that drives efficiencies, increases individual and team productivity, and elevates customer value, whilst driving a culture of continual improvement. Over the 11-week program, participants cover 5 modules that encapsulate the core principles of LEAN and six sigma, before demonstrating the application of their learnings to their role and business area.
6febf458-5362-4fe3-a7b6-2be00a8c3923.name: RSR LEAN white belt

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have undergone an 11-week course that encapsulates 5 core modules of learning, delivered in a blended format. The 5 modules are 1) Value, Waste, Standards & Process Confirmation - 2) Vision, Visual Management & Huddles 3) Problem Solving 4) Planning Control & Operating Rhythm 5) Coaching (for those in Managerial positions).

Earners of this badge have completed online assessments that demonstrate their understanding of the core principles across the 5 modules of learning, and that they are able to identify and apply relevant models, theories, and actions to their personal situations.

At RSR our learning programs focus on supporting participants in being able to make the transfer of knowledge into on-the-job skills & competencies. To support this the program includes individual application assignments where participants demonstrate their ability to put learning into action and create change and efficiencies within their role and wider account. team. This demonstrated application is a critical component to achieving the LEAN white belt certification.

de62d431-0e84-4a55-8764-05a5f8e16cac.description: A set of training modules over several months provides attendees with a basic understanding of the Agile mindset & behaviors. Also, looking at the Scrum Framework, values, events, and practices and how to apply them in their teams.
de62d431-0e84-4a55-8764-05a5f8e16cac.name: Certified Agile Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: The mandatory requirement to attend the Scrum Academy Training Course lasted three months. A final exam, consisting of 80 questions, for 1 hour, with a 75% pass rate, covering all aspects of the syllabus, needed to be completed.

skills.name: Basic Agile Understanding (Mindset, Behaviours, Practices) / Understanding & Applying the Scrum Framework (including Empiricism, ScrumValues, Scrum Artefacts, the Scrum Team, Scrum Events)

e5b5741d-53f8-4238-9246-6acf9a94bc55.description: In today’s global environment working with people from different cultures is an essential part of business, whether we face this complexity internally or externally. This program upskills participants' cross-cultural awareness and sensitivity toward cultural differences. They learn to identify the key cultural dimensions impacting their day-to-day business interactions and how to apply their new knowledge to improve stakeholder and team relationships and ways of working.
e5b5741d-53f8-4238-9246-6acf9a94bc55.name: doing business globally | working across cultures

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have successfully completed a 7-week virtual program that covers the 5 key dimensions of culture: Time, Communication, Authority, Trust & Relationships, and Persuasion. The full learning journey consists of 8-hours of live facilitated virtual workshops, 2-3-hours of self-guided online learning, and an end-of-program individual presentation.

Earners of this badge are required to present application-based learning outcomes at the end of the program. Via a short presentation, they demonstrate the application of the 5 dimensions and their key learnings to their individual working scenarios and to specific stakeholders.

a7604934-32a9-49e4-b330-c1031706313c.description: This badge is awarded to individuals who have demonstrated exceptional application and knowledge of data fluency. They have successfully graduated from the Influence through data insight program and identified as data fluency ambassadors across our global organization. The earner of this badge has been trained through a rigorous train-the-trainer program to facilitate this data fluency program and act as SMEs to participants in the program.
a7604934-32a9-49e4-b330-c1031706313c.name: Influence Through Data Insights Certified Trainer

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have completed the Influence Through Data Insights data fluency intensive.
Earners of this badge have proven their skills in data fluency and talent advisory through a project-based proof of application and impact.
Earners of this badge have successfully completed a comprehensive train-the-trainer program to earn this designation.
Earners of this badge have been assessed through a teach-back for content knowledge, facilitation skills, and data mastery.

fcefb3c6-365b-4078-905d-0f3b6004e53f.description: As the entry-level learning pathway, the specialist program provides the participant with foundational Tableau Desktop skills combined with a clear understanding of how to apply these using the Randstad analytics best practice toolset. The participant is further exposed to the global Tableau community, utilized for support and inspiration through practical participation. The aim is to empower the participant to successfully connect to, explore, and analyze data to solve business questions.
fcefb3c6-365b-4078-905d-0f3b6004e53f.name: Tableau Learning Pathway @ Randstad: Specialist level

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have successfully completed all the modules of the Tableau Desktop Fundamentals e-learning course, which consists of 30 - 40 hours (relevant for complete new starters) of learning & practical application. Earners of this badge have completed the following three Randstad courses for Tableau creators:1) Dashboard Design @ Randstad (2,5 hours) 2) Tableau The Basics (3 hours)3) Data source level 1 (4 hours)4) Tableau template-related training (4,5 hours)

a91e1d43-108a-479f-93cd-50761f43bc8f.description: An authority in total talent advisory has the ability to influence thought, opinion, and make recommendations based on data driven insights. With a fundamental understanding of the human capital landscape, the labor market, consultative skills, and a working knowledge of our core RSR solutions, an authority is able to advise their stakeholders in total talent solutions. An authority is a trusted partner to those they serve.
a91e1d43-108a-479f-93cd-50761f43bc8f.name: Authority in Total Talent Advisory

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners have completed an intensive "total talent advisory" learning path including courses in the following subjects: MSP, RPO, Randstad Corporate Solutions, Statement of Work, Total Talent Solutions, Advisory Skills, Recruitment Best Practices, Conflict Management, Introduction to Data Fluency, Time Management, and Conscious Inclusion.

Badge earners must have successfully completed the Influence Through Data Insights development program. This is an intense 8 week program with a focus on data fluency and the ability to translate human capital data into meaningful insights for the stakeholders that we serve.

Badge earners are required to submit a portfolio of proof of application that is assessed by an expert global committee. The work samples must include a number of examples of how they'v been able to apply the learning and convert the key competencies into proven business results.
Applicants for this certification must have completed the Total Talent Advisory Authority Level Assessment Exam with a passing grade of 85% or above.

ff843fd3-434a-44d2-91a0-493dffc9e3cd.description: This badge is awarded to successful graduates of the Evolve MSP/RPO Program which is a certification program designed to educate participants on the basics of recruiting in RPO and entry-level account management in an MSP. Participants learn from subject matter experts in live webinars as well as receive coaching from employees who currently work in recruiting and specialist roles throughout the program.
ff843fd3-434a-44d2-91a0-493dffc9e3cd.name: Evolve MSP/RPO Program Graduate

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the Evolve Upskilling program require 30 hours of coursework over the course of 8 weeks.

The final project in the program is a 10-minute presentation reviewing the highlights of what they have learned with slides they designed for members of the Randstad Sourceright leadership team.  Participants are required to field questions from the leadership panel after their presentation.  They are also required to pass a knowledge check over the content of the program.

The live workshops provide participants the opportunity to learn the essentials to interviewing in an RPO environment, sourcing fundamentals, basics of MSP specialist account management, and a deep dive into time management skills.  They complete a variety of online courses with knowledge checks in advance of their live webinars, so they are equipped with a foundational knowledge of the concepts.

6390a7e4-e750-4078-ba0c-dfb6de64ea13.description: The Global Executive Leadership Program is an intensive 10-month program that supports the development of our future executive leaders. Participants develop the skills to become global leaders developing harnessing learnings on business transformation, intercultural management and effective leadership styles. In partnership, they gain practical application of the learning, by leading a high-impact global business project that has a direct impact on business performance.
6390a7e4-e750-4078-ba0c-dfb6de64ea13.name: Global Executive Program

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge must have successfully completed the full Global Executive Program, including all modules of learning. The full learning journey consists of 5 areas of learning; Harnessing a Growth Mindset, Leading Transformation in a Digital Age, Intercultural Management, Personal Leadership styles totalling 50+ hours of in-person or virtually facilitated workshops over a 10-month period.

Earners of this badge have led a global project for 4+ months to address a business-critical problem. The project included an analysis of the problem statement and business impact, solution design and where application a business pilot. Project findings and recommendations were presented to our Global Executive Leadership Team
Earners of this badge have undergone a formally accredited 360 feedback process, gaining insights and feedback into their personal leadership styles and personal strengths in relation to their role.
Earners of this badge have demonstrated competence of presenting to executive leadership and board members as part of their group project influencing business decisions at an executive level.
